sentence.Network_en: Any expenses you may incur will be chargeable to the company.
sentence.Network_cn: 你的所有开销均由本公司支付。

sentence.Network_en: Any costs that you incur will be reimbursed in full.
sentence.Network_cn: 你的所有花费都将全额付还.

sentence.Network_en: While that option would incur fewer casualties, it would not be militarily effective.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管那种选择造成的伤亡人数可能会更少，却并不能取得军事上的胜利。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin incurrere, from in- 'towards' + currere 'run'

entry.def: If you incur something unpleasant, it happens to you because of something you have done.

example.ex: The government had also incurred huge debts...
She falls in love and incurs the wrath of her father.
example.tran: 她恋爱了,这引起了父亲的愤怒。

means.word_mean: 1. make oneself subject to; bring upon oneself; become liable to;

sentences.sentence: "People who smoke incur a great danger to their health"
"These aspects of civilization do not find expression or receive an interpretation"
"I got nothing but trouble for my good intentions"

auth_sentence.content: Bribe-taking in China can technically incur the death penalty.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bribe-taking in China can technically incur the death penalty.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bribe-taking in China can technically incur the death penalty.

auth_sentence.content: So these depositors too will incur losses running to billions of euros.
auth_sentence.res_content: So these depositors too will incur losses running to billions of euros.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So these depositors too will incur losses running to billions of euros.

auth_sentence.content: Blogging is "subject to scrutiny and can incur serious consequences".
auth_sentence.res_content: Blogging is "subject to scrutiny and can incur serious consequences".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Blogging is "subject to scrutiny and can incur serious consequences".

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =run,表示"跑,发生,快速做……"; 2. =care,表示"关心"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 正确无误的;准确的,精确的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ac再+cur关心+ate……的→再关心,弄精确为止

stems_affixes.value_cn: 好奇的, 求知的, 古怪的, 爱挑剔的

stems_affixes.word_buile: accurate[[adj.正确无误的;准确的,精确的]]→n.准确[性];精确;准确度
cur关心+io→珍贵的被人多加关心的东西
cur关心+iosity多……的状态→关心多→好奇心
con共同+cur跑,发生,快速做……→共同跑→共同发生
in进入+cur跑,发生,快速做……→跑进来→招惹

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发生,出现;存在;想起,想到
stems_affixes.word_buile: oc向+cur跑,发生,快速做……→某个方向跑,发生

stems_affixes.value_cn: [尤指不好的事]一再发生;重现
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再次+cur跑,发生,快速做……→再次跑来

means.word_mean: 遭受; 招致, 引起

sentences.en: He incurred a heavy loss through you.
sentences.cn: 他因为你而遭受重大损失。

jushi.english: She imagined it was that weakness which had incurred the contempt of Glaucus.
jushi.chinese: 她想,一定是那个缺点招致了格劳科斯的蔑视。

jushi.english: He incurred a heavy loss through you.
jushi.chinese: 他因为你而遭受重大损失。
